name: POOM - Paxien One Online Multiplayer
description:
POOM - Paxien One Online Multiplayer is a created by the Unity game engine. POOM is still in development and has allot of work ahead of itself. 

Version 1.1.1 is the Island Unlocked version which sets you the player high in the sky awaiting your decision on how you want to play the game. The game is viewed from either 1st or 3rd person perspective to unlock the games viewing experience in multiple ways. With an arsenal of weapons, explosions and tools.

POOMPatcher is a patching system to update new content to the game and will update without having to download a full versions all over again.

The game is currently in a VERY early development stage, so more information will be given soon.
